channel.title: [repost] Insidiax gowars interface help
channel.description:
I know where to add the zamorak pic, in rsinterface but i need help with the code: addHoveredButton(?, "godwarsMenu/CUSTOM", ?, ?, ?, ?); addHoverButton?, "godwarsMenu/CUSTOM", ?, ?, ?, "@red@Zamorak", ?, ?, ?); parameters: addhoverbutton : (int i, String imageName, int j, int width, int height, String text, int contentType, int hoverOver, int aT) addhoveredbutton: (int i, String imageName, int j, int w, int h, int IMAGEID)
if someone could form the code for me post a reply, if not could someone atleast help me figure this out

item.title: [repost] Insidiax gowars interface help
item.dc:creator: @bestofpvm bestofpvm
item.description:
@bestofpvm wrote:

I know where to add the zamorak pic, in rsinterface but i need help with the code:
addHoveredButton(?, “godwarsMenu/CUSTOM”, ?, ?, ?, ?);
addHoverButton?, “godwarsMenu/CUSTOM”, ?, ?, ?, “@red@Zamorak”, ?, ?, ?);
parameters:
addhoverbutton : (int i, String imageName, int j, int width, int height, String text, int contentType, int hoverOver, int aT)
addhoveredbutton: (int i, String imageName, int j, int w, int h, int IMAGEID)

if someone could form the code for me post a reply, if not could someone atleast help me figure this out
